attributes.action: Petition for a 3rd Referendum should the petition for a 2nd Referendum succeed.
attributes.background: Self explanatory. Should not be a second referendum. The people voted and decided. But hey ho, swings and roundabouts.

rejection.details:
Petition against a second referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134345

Petition about a third referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134120
